data.text: @EconomicTimes They are already vaccinated... Food is already taken care off already as they belong to well to do families.. Just do a favor... Pls don't ask them to wait for your COVID Testing Drama.. If you can do anything then just ask the arrogant taxi drivers not to overcharge
@EconomicTimes Financial implications are just nothing but give wide publicity.
@EconomicTimes Those people are rich, u dont hav to provide anything free to them
@EconomicTimes Centre will take care of everything, no need to poke nose to take credit
@EconomicTimes They are trying hard for some political score...

@EconomicTimes People leaving and paying taxes here had to pay for testing , vaccine, isolation, medical.
Sad but true!
